results.title: George Plimpton's New York
results.creator_credit: John McGreevy, Pat Ferns, Nielsen-Ferns and John McGreevy Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Cities”.
George Plimpton takes an overall look at the life in New York. From buildings and bridges, beauty and decay, wealth and poverty, to the culture of the people who give the city life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John McGreevy, Pat Ferns, Nielsen-Ferns and John McGreevy Productions

results.title: F.H. Greenway
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Behind the Legend”.
Introduced by Manning Clarke, the film proficiently reconstructs the story of Francis Greenway’s relationship and court case with Edward Sanderson of the N.S.W. Corps, and gives glimpses of the conditions in the colony under the Governorship of Macquarie. Written by Joanne Bean, the cast includes John Ewart as Francis Greenway and Nick Tate as Captain Sanderson.

results.title: R. O'Hara Burke
results.creator_credit: Alan Burke, Australian Broadcasting Commission and ABC-TV (Australia)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Behind the Legend”.
Presents a dramatized reenactment of the events surrounding Robert O’Hara Burke through the memories of his friends. Aspects of his life, the Burke and Wills Expedition and his death are reconstructed. Introduced by Manning Clark and written by Thomas Keneally. Cast includes Tony Allyn as Burke, Cornelia Frances, Ian Nimmo, Richard Lupina, Don Philps, David Williams, Clive Marshall and Shirley Sunners.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Alan Burke, Australian Broadcasting Commission and ABC-TV (Australia)

results.title: Wm Bligh
results.creator_credit: John Croyston, Alan Burke, Australian Broadcasting Commission and ABC-TV (Australia)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Behind the Legend”.
Presents a dramatized re-enactment of the events surrounding the arrest of Governor William Bligh by the New South Wales Corps in 1808. Various witnesses present their accounts of cowardice and misappropriation by Bligh. Introduced by Manning Clark and written by Thomas Keneally. Cast includes Brian James as Bligh, Peter Gwynne, Richard Meikle, Kevin Leslie, John Trenaman, Robyn Nevin.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John Croyston, Alan Burke, Australian Broadcasting Commission and ABC-TV (Australia)

results.title: Trombone and tuba
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 9 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and music lover. Professional musicians show how the trombone and the tuba are played, demonstrate their range and tone and how to care for them.

results.title: Trumpet and cornet
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 8 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
Part of a series of films designed to assist the musician and the music lover. Professional musicians, Glenn Madden and Gary Foot, demonstrate how the trumpet and the cornet are played, their range and tone, and show how to care for these instruments.
